response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $14,500. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
